overview: Get your adrenaline pumping in this fast-paced sex chase!  In the backstreets of Los Angeles, Carmen Luvana stars as a sexy Latina bombshell who gets off on speed, studs, and sex. She uses her wicked Spanish curves to infiltrate an illegal street-racing gang, headed by a slick hustler who gets Carmen's panties wet. Rough sex, anal penetration, orgies, car groupies and hot girls will get your stick shift cranked up and ready to blast off!
title: Racer X
